detail_desc: Soft, padded nursing bras in jersey made from an organic cotton blend with opening, jersey-lined cups with space for nursing pads. Decorative lace trims, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.

Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a round neckline and long sleeves. Detachable tie belt under the bust and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jersey trousers with a regular, elasticated waist and straight, wide legs with sewn-in creases and contrasting colour side stripes.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Boxy-style top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif. Narrow, ribbed trim around the neckline, dropped shoulders and short sleeves with sewn in turn-ups.
Hooded jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Wide waist belt in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width approx. 5 cm.
Large imitation leather purse with a zip around the top, twelve card slots and a zipped coin compartment. Lined. Size 2x10x19.5 cm.
Dress in soft cotton jersey with short sleeves, a sailor collar with a decorative tie detail at the front, and contrasting colour details.
Waist belt of imitation leather straps with a decorative knot at the front, and elastic straps at the back with a metal fastener. Width approx. 3.5 cm.
Briefs in printed cotton jersey with a lined gusset.

Slightly shorter polo-neck jumper in a rib knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and roll-edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.

Straight-cut blouse in a modal-blend weave with a wide neckline with elastication and a narrow frill trim. Opening at the top with a decorative drawstring, hole embroidery at the front and long raglan balloon sleeves with broderie anglaise and elasticated cuffs.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric. Hood with a wrapover front, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and a straight, cut-off, raw-edge hem.
Blouse in airy satin with a lace yoke, sewn in wrapover at the front and a V-neck with a concealed button. Long sleeves with elasticated cuffs and an elasticated seam at the waist.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Imitation leather trainers with a lightly padded top edge, elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front. Contrasting colour heel caps and mesh linings and insoles.
Eight-piece set containing metal ear cuffs and earrings in various designs.
Knee-length dress in jersey crêpe with a wrapover, draped top, long sleeves and seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt.
Skirt in a woven viscose blend with covered elastication at the back of the waist, a seam at the top and decorative, tiered flounces.
Metal hair grips decorated with glass rhinestones.

department_name: Denim wardrobe H&M man inactive from S.6
detail_desc: Single-breasted jacket in a stretch, checked weave with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Fitted, off-the-shoulder jersey top in a soft viscose blend with a V-neck front and back and long sleeves.
Block-coloured jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Calf-length dress in a viscose crêpe weave with a sweetheart neckline, long puff sleeves with a button at the cuffs, a concealed zip at the back and a seam at the waist. Unlined.
Shorts in sturdy jersey made from a cotton blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, pleats at the front and discreet pockets in the side seams.
Leotard in glossy jersey with a print motif on the front, crossover straps at the back and 3/4-length sleeves. Glittery elasticated seam at the waist, a lined gusset and a layered tulle skirt.

Biker treggings in stretch twill made from a cotton blend with a fake fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and decorative seams at the knees. Wide jersey waist panel for best fit over the tummy.
Knee-length shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist and patch front pockets.
Cap with a motif on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Metal hoop earrings with pendants. Length 6.5 cm.
Poncho in a soft knit containing some wool with open sides. Length at the front and back 80 cm.
T-shirt in sturdy cotton jersey with a lightly brushed finish.
Ankle-length cargo trousers in washed, stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets and flap leg pockets with a button.
Long-sleeved dresses in soft organic cotton jersey with a seam at the waist and gently flared skirt.

Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, two buttons at the top, saddle shoulders and short sleeves with ribbed trims. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, embroidered detail on the chest and short sleeves with small ribbed trims. Slits at the hem.

Lined shell trousers in wind- and waterproof, breathable functional fabric with closed seams. Adjustable, elasticated waist, a reflective strip on each leg, elasticated hems and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Boxy-style jumper in a fine-knit alpaca blend with a round, ribbed neckline, low dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Short, pile-lined parka in a cotton weave with padded sleeves, a stand-up collar and pile-lined hood with a detachable faux-fur trim. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, and a drawstring at the waist and hem. Flap front pockets with a press-stud and a concealed pocket behind with a press-stud at the top. Elasticated tab with a concealed press-stud at the cuffs, and a small back vent. Lined.
Sleeveless top in a fine knit with an open back and wide ties at the back of the hem. Ribbed trims around the neckline, armholes and hem.

Long-sleeved top in soft jersey and a pair of dungarees in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Dungarees with a kangaroo pocket, adjustable straps with a press-stud, and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirts in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and a round, ribbed neckline.

Trousers in a sturdy Tencel™ lyocell and silk weave with a sheen. High waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening, zip fly, diagonal side pockets, a welt back pocket and gently tapered legs with creases.
Briefs in cotton designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin. Mid waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.
Fitted top in a rib-knit viscose blend with a round, ribbed neckline, long sleeves and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Pointelle-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.

Dress in an airy weave with covered elastication and a flounce at the neckline. Opening with a shimmering button at the back of the neck and an elasticated seam at the waist with a decorative bow at the front. Unlined.
Pyjama bottoms in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
5-pocket stretch cotton twill trousers in a relaxed fit with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud.
Treggings in stretch, denim-look jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Leggings in washed superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with sequined sections on the legs. Elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with terry stripes in a relaxed fit with a ribbed neckline.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, stretch cotton jersey with a glittery pattern, a seam at the waist and gently flared skirt.

Fitted, off-the-shoulder dress in ribbed jersey with narrow shoulder straps, a wide foldover edge at the top, long sleeves and a slit at the back. Concealed silicon trim at the top to hold the dress in place. Lined.
Long-sleeved blouse in an airy weave with a collar, buttons down the front and at the cuffs, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Unlined.
5-pocket skirt in washed, stretch cotton denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, slit at the front and raw-edge hem. The cotton content of the skirt is partly recycled.
Trousers in imitation leather with a high waist, zip fly and press-stud, fake welt back pockets and slim legs.

prod_name: LS Blue moon SS SL set (W)
detail_desc: LOVE STORIES x H&M. Pyjamas with a strappy top and shorts in a patterned weave. Top with a lace-trimmed V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Short shorts with an elasticated waist and wide legs.
Hooded sports jacket in fast-drying functional fabric. Zip down the front with a chin guard, kangaroo pockets and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Cropped top in a crinkled weave with decorative buttons at the front, narrow, tie-top shoulder straps and smocking at the top and hem. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Socks in a fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif, a double-layered drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Shirt in organic Oxford cotton with a button-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and yoke with a hanger at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Set with an all-in-one suit, bodysuit, trousers and hat in organic cotton jersey. All-in-one suit with long sleeves, press-studs down the front and long legs with press-studs down the insides. Wrapover bodysuit with long sleeves and press-studs at the side and crotch. Trousers with a ribbed waist, and a hat.
Wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined, drawstring hood, long raglan sleeves, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short, fitted jersey top with short sleeves, a visible seam down the front and an asymmetric hem. Slightly shorter front with a draped detail at the hem.
Short top in soft jersey with narrow shoulder straps, a zip in one side and wide lace trim at the hem.
Bodysuit in soft, organic cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder, long sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and button, back pockets and skinny legs.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a ribbed, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Print motif down one leg and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Joggers in soft jersey with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Short V-neck dress in a patterned weave with a wrapover front with ties at one side and concealed press-studs at the other. Unlined.
Fitted top in a linen and viscose weave with a sweetheart neckline and short puff sleeves with elastication at the shoulders and hems.
Short, fitted top in ribbed jersey with short sleeves, a visible seam down the front and a decorative knot detail at the hem.

Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with an integral sports bra and racer back. Sports bra with a double layer of fabric at the front, elasticated hem and opening at the back with crossover straps.
Blouse in an airy weave with an elasticated neckline and small frilled collar. Long raglan balloon sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
